page.description: XBasic monitors CPU usage for the thread using settings provided. MaxCPUPercent - Between 0 and 100 MonitorTime - How often the usage is checked. Default is 5 sec. RecoveryTime - How long a thread remains at a lowered priority. Defaults to 300 sec.(5 min.) LogMessage - Identifying string.
page.syntax: V THREAD_MONITOR_CPU_USAGE(C ThreadName, N MaxCPUPercent [,N MonitorTime [,N RecoveryTime[,C LogMessage]]])
